system.description: Fierce and brazen, these mages are always at war. The arms dealers of the world, their magic is completely focused on destruction and thus they seek to create bigger and better ways to blow things up. Passionate, wild and a bit chaotic, these mages like the mountains and underground spaces. If you are playing a Flame Mage be hot tempered, war-like, ready for battle, and consuming everything.

overview.base: You may rotate between flame rotator spells during a short rest instead of a long rest.
overview.proficient: You are fluent in Flame Rotators. (This does not make you fluent in the spells themselves.)

overview.base: When you attack with Flame Ray or Fire Ball, you may target an additional creature or the same creature twice. Any costs you pay must be paid twice and be the same for both attacks These incur attack penalties as though they were two separate attacks.
overview.fluent: You may instead choose up to 1 + F additional or repeated targets.

overview.base: Add Cremate and Minor Weapon Enchantment to your list of possible rotator spells.

In addition to the custom rotator spells you create, you can learn spells created by others. When you come across a fully created spell using only words you are fluent in, can make a DC 12 + OP INT feat save to attempt to learn it. If you succeed, you can add it to your rotator spell list. If you fail, you are incapable of attempting to learn that spell again. The GM may modify the DC based on the spell's complexity, your knowledge of the spell, any special training you receive, if the spell's creator is there to assist you, or for any other factors they see fit. You may also attempt to learn words that you come across as long as they are of elements you are fluent in. The GM may adjust the DC for these as they see fit as well, but the default is DC 15 + OP INT feat save.
overview.proficient: You are fluent in Elder Sorcery Creation, Celestial Elder Sorcery Words, and Flame Elder Sorcery Words.

results.save: You learn the spell or word.
results.fail: You are incapable of attempting to learn that spell or word again.

overview.base: You gain Limited Spell Strike.

Once per short rest, you may cast a ritual flame spell in half the time it would normally take. Additionally, once per long rest, you may cast a flame spell as though you were adept at it.

You also gain the Bombastic and Sudden casting styles.
overview.proficient: You may now use the benefits from Flame Disciplines P times per long rest.
overview.fluent: You may now use the benefits from Flame Disciplines F times per short rest.

results.hit: Target is burned, and ruined.

overview.base: Target takes the "on hit" effect of a conjured missile spell that you are proficient in. If the triggering hit was a critical hit, then the target takes the "on critical hit" effect instead.

system.trigger: You have just landed a hit with a weapon or bite attack on another creature and the effect has successfully applied.
system.limitation: Only usable with Flame Ray and Fire Ball.

overview.base: The triggering spell becomes extremely visible and loud. Visually the spell extends 10 feet in all directions from a line between the caster and each of its targets. The spell can be heard up to 600 feet away.

system.trigger: You are casting a spell.

overview.base: Target weapon is enchanted to deal magic damage and grant a conjured ray spell that you know. Except, the spell has the AV0 weapon delivery instead, is gifted, and can only be delivered with the enchanted weapon. The enchanted weapon is tier 1. If the weapon is shattered, this enchantment fades.

system.heightened: For each additional MP spent, the duration of this effect increases by 1 hour. The overall duration is rounded to the nearest hour.

overview.base: You cast a single action spell that the triggering creature is moving out of sight or out of range of. The triggering creature must be within range of the spell when it triggers and at least one of the targets of the spell you cast.

system.trigger: Another creatures would move out of sight or out of range of a single action spell you could cast.
